name: Global Analytic Information Technology Service (GAITS)
overview: Global Analytic Information Technology Services, Inc. provides information technology (IT), cyber security, and energy technology services to federal civilian and defense agencies, and e-governments in the United States and internationally. The company offers information assurance and cyber security services for systems inventory, risk management and threat analysis, privacy management, certification and accreditation, regulatory review and guidance, lifecycle support of security technologies, and cyber security products. It also provides IT systems engineering, integration, and installation services in the areas of information security/assurance, networking, helpdesk support, enterprise architecture, and IT support services for government applications. In addition, the companyâ€™s IT support services include business process reengineering, drafting and illustration support, information system engineering and integration, installation support and materials, systems analysis and engineering surveys, and transitional operations and maintenance support. Further, it offers scientific visualizations services, including computer animation, information visualization, interface technology and perception, surface rendering, volume rendering, and volume visualization; systems engineering services, including requirements definition, design and implementation, testing, and deployment; and program test and evaluation, program management, independent verification and validation, and quality assurance and control services. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Alexandria, Virginia with additional offices in Dayton, Ohio; Albuquerque, New Mexico; Pleasanton, California; Sierra Vista, Arizona; Idaho Falls, Idaho; and Frankfurt, Germany.

milestones.description: GAITS Receives Minority Investment From FedCap Partners
